name: Jigsaw Impact
description:
[-Introduction-]

-Do you want extremely beautiful cards? Let's collect the puzzle pieces and put them back together to complete the level and open more cards with beautiful waifu.

- Good luck ~! And share with me what you got ! 

[-Tutorials-]

- Very easy to play : Gather all the pieces at the bottom put them together and get your anime girl card.

[-Devices-]

- Support all Android devices

[-Credits-]

- Game developer : HaDo
